about_the_game:
Grow your Farming Simulator 19 experience, adding new forestry opportunities with the Rottne DLC pack!

This DLC contains two new vehicles from Rottne, one of the industry’s leading forest equipment companies:
- The Rottne F20D: Wood Forwarder
- The Rottne HD21D: Wood Harvester

Once you’ve downloaded the DLC, this additional content will appear and become available through the in-game shop. Make sure you have enough in-game currency to buy them!
This DLC is included in the Season Pass.
detailed_description:
Grow your Farming Simulator 19 experience, adding new forestry opportunities with the Rottne DLC pack!

This DLC contains two new vehicles from Rottne, one of the industry’s leading forest equipment companies:
- The Rottne F20D: Wood Forwarder
- The Rottne HD21D: Wood Harvester

Once you’ve downloaded the DLC, this additional content will appear and become available through the in-game shop. Make sure you have enough in-game currency to buy them!
This DLC is included in the Season Pass.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: requires macOS 10.13.5 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz or AMD FX-4100 @3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7770 graphic card or higher (min. 2 GB VRAM, supports DX11)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME

name: Farming Simulator 19 - Rottne DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz or AMD FX-4100 @3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7770 graphics card or better (min. 2 GB VRAM, DX11 support)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Grow your Farming Simulator 19 experience, adding new forestry opportunities with the Rottne DLC pack! This DLC contains two new vehicles from Rottne, one of the industry’s leading forest equipment companies.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
